output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---
 
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "Over.the.last.2.weeks..how.often.have.you.been.bothered.by.any.of.the.following.problems."
q_final_response <- "X.91"
t <- "Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?"
q_data <- get_choose_all(raw_data, q.name = q, f.response = q_final_response)
dir.create("output/q15_anxiety")
```

```{r}
write.csv(q_data, 'output/q15_anxiety/q15_anxiety_scales_data.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
table_1 <- get_single_selection_2(q_data, "Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge") %>%
  filter(response != "N/A") %>%
  clean_single_select_2()
q_n <- tally(table_1, count)
r1 <- plot_single_select(table_1) +
  labs(title = "Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge", subtitle = q_n)
r1
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = "output/q15_anxiety/q15_anxiety.png", plot = r1, device = 'png')
write.csv(table_1, paste0("output/q15_anxiety/q15_anxiety_", q_n, ".csv"), row.names = FALSE)
```
